name: Alien Slayer
description:
A top-down rogue-like shooter. Customize your weapons with looted upgrades to stay alive as long as possible. Freely combine different upgrades to make use of their synergy and craft your own unique way of playing.
Each round your face of against and ever increasing numbers of enemies that become stronger as the game progresses.
Collect valuable upgrades and different guns along the way that help you survive.
